ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This class provides an in-depth look at a wide range of current issues in psychopathology. I would definitely recommend it to someone looking to acquire general knowledge about the field, as well as delve into its complex controversies.
Yes, I would recommend the course to another student, especially if he or she is interested in the field of clinical psychology.
Read the syllabus and expect it to be even better. Take the course, if you are interested in the subject.
Yes. I enjoyed taking this class, and I learned a lot.
A great opportunity to discuss psychopathology at a higher level than just learning the symptoms of the DSM. I would highly recommend this.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It broadened my knowledge and gave me hints which questions I further want to investigate.

This course allowed me to think more broadly about how we diagnose individuals, and how different disorders are related. Furthermore, it caused me to think about the shared mechanisms that lead to each disorder.
